channel.title: The dumbest question in the world, I guess
channel.description:
I want to add 4 thiefing stalls, but I don't know how. I also want to change the exp rates and the coins you get from it. like 1st stall = lvl 1 needed and gives 25k/250 exp 2nd stall = lvl 30 needed and gives 75k/600 exp 3rd stall = lvl 60 needed and gives 125k/1000 exp 4th stall = lvl 80 needed and gives 200k/2500 exp
Can anyone help me with getting this? I know it's very dumb....

item.title: The dumbest question in the world, I guess
item.dc:creator: @iCreatedHorror Ryan
item.description:
@iCreatedHorror wrote:

You have “playerLever”; it should be playerLevel, should it not?

Back up you’re client.java also incase something goes wrong.
This is what my “public void” looks like

public void TheifStall(String stallName, String message, int lvlReq, int XPamount, int item, int itemAmount, int emote) { if(System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction < actionInterval) return; if(playerLevel[17] >= lvlReq) { actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); setAnimation(emote); sM("You take from the stall.."); sM(message); addItem(item, itemAmount); addSkillXP(XPamount, 17); } else if(playerLevel[17] < lvlReq) { sM("You need a theiving level of "+lvlReq+" to theif from this stall."); } }

And this is what my stall code looks like

if(objectID == 2561){ TheifStall("cake stall", "and recieve a baked cake", 1, 75*playerLevel[17], 1891, 1, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2562){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 7.5k", 80, 500*playerLevel[17], 995, 7500, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2560){ TheifStall("silk stall", "and recieve 2750gp", 1, 110*playerLevel[17], 995, 2750, 0x340); } if(objectID == 2565){ TheifStall("silver stall", "and recieve 5750gp", 50, 310*playerLevel[17], 995, 5750, 0x340); } if(objectID == 4708){ TheifStall("vegetable stall", "and recieve a tomatoe", 60, 35*playerLevel[17], 1982, 1, 0x340); }
You can figure out which is the experience, as you should teach yourself something..

Read full topic

item.title: The dumbest question in the world, I guess
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

I get this error if I try to compile it:

.\src\Client.java:8475: cannot find symbol symbol : variable PlayerLever location: class client if= level); ^ .\src\Client.java:8475: cannot find symbol symbol : variable level location: class client if= level); ^ .\src\Client.java:8475: cannot find symbol symbol : variable expamount location: class client addSkillXP(xpamount, 250); ^ 3 errors Press to continue...

I get that and don’t know how to fix it.

This are my settings in src/client.java:

if(objectID == 629 && System.currentTimeMillis() - lastAction > actionInterval){ if(playerLever[17] >= level); actionInterval = 4000; lastAction = System.currentTimeMillis(); sM("you steal 25k from the stall"); addItem(995, 25000); addSkillXP(xpamount, 250); setAnimation(881); } else { sM("You need a thieving level of __ to steal from here"); }

I know that the problem is in this code, because when I delete it, the compiler works fine.

Read full topic
